testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to update the information of the course FAQ with the specified ID via an API connection.
testcase.name: The status code returned after a PATCH request with valid authorization credentials, correct (id), and data
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/updateCoursefaq/165" path parameters...............passed * The api user prepares a PATCH request containing the "Will I receive a certificate upon completion of the course?" and "Yes, upon successful completion of the course, you will receive a certificate of completion to showcase your achievement." information to send to the api updateCoursefaq endpoint..passed * The api user sends a "PATCH" request and saves the returned response......passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "remark" information in the response body is "success"..passed * The api user verifies that the "Message" information in the response body is "Successfully Updated."..passed * The api user verifies that the "Updated Course Faq ID" information in the returned response body is the same as the id path parameter written in the endpoint..passed
